name: Mining Facility
description: “Nearby the mining site, these butterflies are attracted to the radiation emitted from the Ethereum gems.” | This is a digitally developed art. Originally painted on its negative colors on paper using watercolor technique. This limited edition of the reveled piece is 3166x4132 px, 6.1 MB, painted in 140lb cold pressed cotton paper (8.6x9 inches) by Adilson Matioli.
